name: Energy leak
description:
3 buttons on the main menu, 3 charges inside your battery, 3 different types of platform, 3-3/3 (2) different "dash positions", 3x3-3 (or 6) different control keys, and (3/3)^3 (1) player characters! Even particle effects (acid drip) come in groups of three! In fact, every equation in this description made up of threes has three threes in it :)

Color shifting is visible in the battery, and multiple randomized palm trees are located in a secret area :> As with most of my projects, I made all the assets, too.

If you just really want to get to the secret area without doing any work, press UP->UP->DOWN->DOWN->LEFT->RIGHT->LEFT->RIGHT->UP->LEFT->RIGHT->DOWN in the help menu

Jam update 3

Added home button when playing the game to return to menu, pressing play returns you to where you were before, added walk sound.

Jam update 2

Improved a couple levels to stop people from rushing into them and falling into the void

Jam update 1

created game
